website_summaries.verdict: Another excellent appliance by KitchenAid that's built to last – but this one comes at a remarkably low price, proving you don't have to sacrifice quality for affordability.
pros: Numerous handy features for an inexpensive price –  illuminated functions, beep alert, and sturdy craftsmanship
Owners love the simplistic design and rave about how evenly it toasts wide items like bagels
cons: Only has 2 slots, but this isn't a deal breaker for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Batman's Toaster; Darkness Prevails
customer_reviews.text: Kitchenaid must not know the definition of the word 'toast'. This appliance should be called a 'burner'. I started on the middle setting of '3' and after the toast started to catch fire, it went downhill from there. There is an annoying 'beep' before your 'charcoal' pops up and the high-lift lever in my unit didn't work so I used my bamboo tongs to fish out my 'flaming hockey pucks of death'. Needless to say, I do not recommend this toaster, even to Batman (who likes things dark).
customer_reviews.author: RKEldon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Well... Runs a bit hot. Had some success on shade 1, ventured to shade 2 and in my option it was not edible. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ski

customer_reviews.title: Nice stylish toaster works great but watch the settings...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toaster so far have only had it a couple of weeks so far so good. You have to watch the settings on here though otherwise you end up with burnt toast. I use gluten free, egg free, dairy free bread so I have to watch the settings 3 works for a good solid toast, avoid four unless you have some thick german style multi-grain bread or bagel. The red colour is a typical KitchenAid red or medium cherry red but not deep cherry red. Looks stylish, match the KitchenAid kettle I have and makes a decent toast you can also rap the cord under the toaster if you don't plug it in everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Geochick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking toaster and feels much sturdier than the precious ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking toaster and feels much sturdier than the precious two I've tried in the last year. The hi-lift lever is helpful and the knob is very easy to see and turn. It does toast both sides but one side does get darker than the other. It'll have to do which is why I gave 4 stars not 5. I had a toaster for 10 years and mistakenly gave it to my college son and now I regret it because most of the ones made now are crap and don't toast well. So learn from my mistake 😊
customer_reviews.author: Nursie2335

customer_reviews.title: Great experience with Kitchen Aid's customer service
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a while. I had to return this toaster to Kitchen Aid because after 6 months of use, it stopped toasting. I have to say my experience with Kitchen Aid was incredible. You don't go through amazon.com but through Kitchen Aid's customer service website. As long as the toaster breaks within the year warranty then you are covered. The new toaster I was sent has a year warranty too. So far the new toaster has been great. I keep it on setting one because it is pretty powerful and will burn your toast easily if you aren't careful. Heavy duty and easy to clean. Quality merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Berkeley

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Basic Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this KitchenAid toaster to replace my higher-priced Cuisinart toaster (that was still working, but always disappointed me). The KitchenAid is stylish, easy to use, and doesn't disappoint. It has wide slots that accommodate very thick pieces of bread (or bagels). It doesn't have an unnecessary whistles and bells. It is easy to use; easy to clean; has a special bagel setting, and a dependable eject button. I was thrilled the first time I used it and didn't have to wait forever for my bread to become toast. (My high-end Cuisinart toaster toasted VERY slowly.) I highly recommend this KitchenAid toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this toaster unless you like your burnt
customer_reviews.text: It is very attractive in my kitchen but even on the very lowest setting, the toast is WAY too brown. I do not recommend this toaster unless you like your burnt.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Mady's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster for three reasons. First of all, I bought it for the Kitchenaid name on the side (and paid for the name). Second, it was pretty, and matched the rest of our kitchen appliances. And third, I expected it to work well. Mission accomplished in all three categories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: $10 toaster with a $40 shell around it
customer_reviews.text: My unit has the same problem mentioned by other reviewers of setting 1 resulting in "heat very slightly", 2 being "toast dark brown" and 3 being "make charcoal" for most any kind of bread or bagels. Worse, the toasting is extremely uneven from top to bottom and from first batch to the next. I still haven't used settings 4 or 5 even once for fear of burning down the house. Nice looking toaster, bad functionally.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Most previous reviews tell the truth: this is a splendid two-slice toaster that easily holds English muffins and bagels and has a great manual lever for popping up whenever one might wish. If you like your toasty fairly light, the lowest setting is perfect. If you like it rather dark, setting 2 will do. If you want it completely burned and good for the dog, the birds and the raccoons, try any higher setting. It looks great and takes up minimal space. I would buy it again, though I am guessing it will last a long time. Finally, the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this toaster. We sent first one back for an exchange. The bread cooks uneven and we burned more than we ate. The temperature control doesn’t seem to read properly. And although, the style was the best on any two slice toaster the exchanges one did the same thing and I tossed it. I was afraid of a fire. Not a typical Kitchen Aide product. Love everything else but this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Magpie

customer_reviews.title: I had a 2 slice Kitchenaid Toaster for over 20 years that worked perfect. This is not that Toaster.
customer_reviews.text: This is a poor Toaster. It toasts uneven, beeps when the toast pops up (unnecessary because the cheap metallic workings "clattering" as it pops up is plenty loud),and the controls seem flimsy and poorly designed. You might as well buy a $19.00 Toaster and take your chances. It couldn't be much worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, until it went out after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Toaster looks great, functioned perfectly as well as looked good on the counter. That only lasted for 2 months. I purchased the updated kitchen aid because the older one lasted for over 11 years. Hopefully it was an anomaly...customer service is currently 91 minute wait, but they have nice hold music.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Might be a defect, not sure
customer_reviews.text: So You can set shade from 1-5. However anything more than about 1.5 and it is burnt to a crisp... I don't know if that's how it is supposed to be, or if it is just a defect on mine. However, I am keeping it, and will just keep the setting at 1.5
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: It says KitchenAid, but is it really?
customer_reviews.text: We are huge KitchenAid fans here, however this toaster falls short for any criteria. The slide down mechanism is soft and fragile, like it’s going to break when pushing on it. Bread toasts in the middle and not the edges. Bagels toast on the edges and not the middle. Both are extra dry. We replaced a cheap toaster that worked fine for 12 years with this one. Huge disappointment. Not the KitchenAid quality I’ve been lucky to have with other products.
customer_reviews.author: Noyum4us

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster and the fact that the bottom comes out for easy cleaning. The cancel and bagel buttons are a plus!
customer_reviews.author: nYcGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: After going through several toasters through the years, I finally decided to spend more and get a good one. I love this toaster! It can toast anything, no matter how thick. It looks good, and it's KitchenAid quality so it should last a long time. It's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D.

customer_reviews.title: It works and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a regular toaster and that’s what I was looking for. Something that heats the bread evenly and doesn’t burn the second and third batch. I know it may sound superficial but I really like the color too - it matches my mixer and espresso machine.
customer_reviews.author: Gergana Vassilev

customer_reviews.title: Evidently it is too much to ask that it just works.
customer_reviews.text: I finally gave up and just went out and bought a Cuisinart. It heats unevenly, no consistency. I could never know if it was going to be not toasted or burnt. Just when I thought I had it figured out it would be different. I spent more than a cheap toaster hoping that it would simply toast a piece of bread.
customer_reviews.author: notnecessary

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Replaced old toaster. Matches the rest of her kitchen appliances. Good value . Like the high raise feature. Easy to select color choice makes your toast they way you like it from light to dark
customer_reviews.author: Dave Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Bakes not toasts!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe what toasters with the bagel option has done to my toast. My old toaster (no bagel) toasted bread!! These bake it until done. The coils on this one do not even get red hot!! The toast is dried out and crumbly when just a light shade of brown. The time it takes to toast, it is no wonder it dries out the bread! Also, this one just happen to leave the bottom of the bread white, while the top burned (no kidding) DO not purchase this unless you like baked toast!!
customer_reviews.author: Raidergrode

customer_reviews.title: This is annoying but is much better than a cold bagel
customer_reviews.text: Bagels are much faster in this toaster than my last, which was the same brand. The problem is if the bagel is cold going, it is cold in the center coming out. My new habit is to warm the bagel in the microwave every time before toasting it in this toaster. This is annoying but is much better than a cold bagel.
customer_reviews.author: Al Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Count on Kitchenaid
customer_reviews.text: I had a toaster that would burn the edges of the bread before it toasted the center. I bought this for a replacement. I have a Kitchenaid mixer and I have been so happy with its performance that I decided to try the Kitchenaid toaster. I haven’t been disappointed. I toast my frozen sourdough bread on the three setting and regular sandwich bread on one. The bread comes out right every time. I toast bread every day so I’m glad I went with Kitchenaid!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie McLeroy

customer_reviews.title: It's a very attractive toaster. However we still haven't ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very attractive toaster. However we still haven't been able to get it to toast both sides of bread evenly. Also setting it past the number one setting, you will have dark toast on one side, hardly toasted on other. Also it's quite large for a small apartment kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: PJane

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We had high hopes for this toaster because we like the brand, but it's failed us. Inconsistent heat, the timer doesn't seem to work and we can't count on an evenly toasted slice.
customer_reviews.author: JustGuyNow

customer_reviews.title: she said it arrived quickly and works great, se said "very streamlined" she's happy
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my aunt who is in her 80's, to replace her broken toaster, she lives in another state, just had it shipped to her, she said it arrived quickly and works great, se said "very streamlined" she's happy, great seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well!
customer_reviews.text: Found that the light to dark doesn't work that well but haven't really found a toaster where it does. It looks good (red) and it is great having the ability to push the toast up a bit so you can grab it. Well made and top stays cool to the touch
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you like your toast burnt
customer_reviews.text: Unless you put it on setting 1 it burns everything, even on setting 1 one side is brown and the other side is completely white. Big disappointment
customer_reviews.author: GA Rick

customer_reviews.title: Not a good toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster after having the same brand for years and loving it. NOT this one. There are SO many things wrong with it: any toasting level beyond 1 burned the toast.the slots are wide for a bagle, but the base/holder that lowers the bread was very thin so if you put in a Poptart or thin bread it fell between the heating elements and the holder getting it stuck. and it only toasts one side of the bread and doesn't even do that evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Dixon

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and the only thing I had to get used ...
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've been using it a while, I thought I would write a review. It works as advertised. It looks nice and the only thing I had to get used to is that it beeps when it pops up. Helpful, but a new sound in the house :) I love this toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Schaller

customer_reviews.title: I love the color of this toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this toaster. I have a few other KitchenAid products that match! Its a solid toaster with a nice silver face. The only problems I have is anything higher than a "2" on the dial will burn toast. Also the left toaster will burn just one end of some things even on level 2. Overall its a decent toaster you just have to watch whatever you put in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid
customer_reviews.text: Standard, simple toaster. I've had no problems with the toasting settings.
customer_reviews.author: New mom to be

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster I've had
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster I've had. Perfect toast every time. Also like that it makes a sound when the toast is ready. I can do other stuff while waiting and not have to worry toast is going to be cold when I get back to it.
customer_reviews.author: jujoak

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but already giving problems
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but already giving problems, the bread keeps popping up before its toasted and sometimes the level doesnt stay down!
customer_reviews.author: angeleyes

customer_reviews.title: I am TOAST
customer_reviews.text: Cute li'l thang. It has a Bagel setting but it doesn't seem to do anything. It's quick and accurate. The red matches my kitchen accessories. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: P. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Underdog toaster
customer_reviews.text: Toaster is used in an environment where there's lots of abuse and wear. Works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brink or Lotte S.

customer_reviews.title: off and I thought Kitchen Aid was a good product - how wrong could you go
customer_reviews.text: This was most disappointing. It was $10.off and I thought Kitchen Aid was a good product - how wrong could you go. But I do regret buying it. It takes forever to toast and even on the lowest setting it burns stuff or doesn't cook enough. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Burt Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster, great style!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, and retro style, works great, beeps when done and has a bagel setting also which is nice
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks extremely good on my counter but toast bread inconsistently
customer_reviews.author: tashun

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a couple weeks at most.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a couple of weeks and now it's already malfunctioning. It will overly toast one side of the bread in each slot and moderately toast the other side. It will burn one side if you don't pay close enough attention.
customer_reviews.author: Tarynr92

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fast and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Toasts bread in about 45 seconds! And it looks really neat next to my other red appliances!
customer_reviews.author: e_mjma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it's vet sturdy and cooks toast evenly. Does get fingerprints though.
customer_reviews.author: Leeroy Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: as we have other KitchenAid products that we are happy with. This one is no different
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing many toasters we decided to go with this one, as we have other KitchenAid products that we are happy with. This one is no different, an excellent product. It does beep when its done, which I think is great because if I am doing other things, it lets me know my toast is done. I would recommend this product to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This toaster looks nice. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looks nice. Unfortunately, the asthetics of the toaster could not compensate for the inner workings. I paid more for this toaster than other brands, thinking Kitchen Aid was better quality. It didn't even last a month. Doesn't toast now. Its still pretty, though.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Helgerson

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toaster 2.5 years ago and it stopped heating properly. It just dries the bread out. I just thought a toaster would last longer than 2.5 years. It hasn’t been used that much. I would say over that’s time period it got very light use. It was not mishandled. The elements just stopped heating up properly.
customer_reviews.author: Francisca A.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with my toaster
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with my toaster,took it out of the box put it on the counter,threw the box away in garbage,later when I was looking at it ,the chrome on one side was dented.can not return it now ,I have no box now to exchange it I just turn the dented side to the corner.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca jones

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bread burner
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but almost burns the toast on even the lowest setting. Also strange operation, need to press cancel button in order to raise the bread. I sent it back because it doesn't provide easy way to have a slightly toasted bread and the whole thing is way too large on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Person loved it! Was best price yet
customer_reviews.text: For a gift! Person loved it! Was best price yet.
customer_reviews.author: V. B. W.

customer_reviews.title: easy to work  and clean
customer_reviews.text: simple and very easy to work, also nice looking red color.

customer_reviews.title: Bad to the bone!
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster ever produced by mankind, always perfect toast. If it's says "kitchen aid" pay the extra and buy it. I have a few things things they make... all top notch!
customer_reviews.author: kenneth jarrell jr

customer_reviews.title: Very slow and inefficient
customer_reviews.text: Toast takes too long and has to be toasted twice to get browned.
customer_reviews.author: Jack L. Payne

customer_reviews.title: It toasts fine. However
customer_reviews.text: It toasts fine. However, the cord storage is very cumbersome--really rather useless, and mine has something loose in inside. It sounds like a piece of metal when you move the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret O. Gainer

customer_reviews.title: Even at "1" shade setting the toast comes out brown ...
customer_reviews.text: Even at "1" shade setting the toast comes out brown. Cannot dial it down any further. I just wonder what the highest setting is used for. It could be a faulty unit and I might simply return for a replacement one.
customer_reviews.author: Bulent Kurdi

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing. Lowest setting burns toast.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I love all my other kitchen aid appliances. There are five settings for toast but lowest setting results in charcoal. You have to stay with the toaster and watch it closely and press cancel to pop it up so it doesn’t burn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong advertising
customer_reviews.text: Review said it was a 4 slot but it's only a 2
customer_reviews.author: Chelle belle

customer_reviews.title: Easily burns your toast.
customer_reviews.text: You better not set it past 1 unless you like burned toast. Anything above the 1 setting will burn. Price is way too high for this product to work like it does. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: naomi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking toaster that does a good job of toasting. .
customer_reviews.author: Jon L. Segal

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: An excellent replacement for the toaster we had for many years. Love the color and features
customer_reviews.author: HarleyGirl

customer_reviews.title: A nice reminder for those like myself who tend to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Ever put something in the toaster and forget? Thank you KitchenAid! ...Once toasting is complete it beeps. A nice reminder for those like myself who tend to get busy and forgetful. LOVE KitchenAid, and this toaster surely upholds that love and trust in their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too hot for most bread
customer_reviews.text: The lowest setting on this toaster still doesn't go low enough to not burn many breads. The toast lever also does not have a lift feature that allows you to lift the toast up for removing. There are affordable options that have more features.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This toaster works okay but the shade knob is. ...
customer_reviews.text: This toaster works okay but the shade knob is... interesting. I have it set to 2 out of 5 and this is how dark it toasts.
customer_reviews.author: Cladams

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Since KitchenAid is usually such a trusted name, we were very surprised at how cheaply made this toaster was. Even from the first use, you could feel how flimsy the push lever was and after four uses, it snapped off. Also, it was unable to regulate its temperature. If you make two batches of toast in a row, the second batch will be burned. Not worthy of the KitchenAid name!
customer_reviews.author: Jana H.

customer_reviews.title: the toaster worked better on one side each
customer_reviews.text: Biased review as I only have KitchenAid appliances. Initially, the toaster worked better on one side each, but after a couple uses, the toasting become more even. It's also quite sturdy - more than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Educated Reader, Evanston

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design
customer_reviews.text: Who ever designed it is an idiot. The power cord is fitted at the front of the toaster and not at the back.
customer_reviews.author: Asaf

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Toaster is a disappointment. It does not toast evenly on both sides. Now today it is malfunctioning. The lever will not engage and stay down. Wish I had bought the (less than $20.00) toaster at TJ Max.
customer_reviews.author: B.Davies

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy looking--and it works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! If you buy one, save the directions until you know them by heart. You have to know how to shift the settings back and forth between toasting bread and bagels. It's a snazzy red color, that brightens up my dull kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Gastil

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Mom and she loves it. Also loves the red color.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just a little bulky to always keep out but looks good with the pop of red in the counter.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and this was well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and functions well. Love the color and this was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Thompson

customer_reviews.title: ... my kitchen and works very well - toast is perfect as are the
customer_reviews.text: Matches my kitchen and works very well - toast is perfect as are the bagels
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Toaster has been working fine for over a year and has a bagel button
customer_reviews.text: Toaster has been working fine for over a year and has a bagel button. No problems with charred bread or bagels. There is also a clear difference for the different settings (from 1 to 5).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toasts perfectly and buttons are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Toasts perfectly and buttons are easy to use. The red matches the other red Kitchen Aid products I have bought over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Mers

customer_reviews.title: looks great, i tried setting 3 toast was very dark ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well , looks great , i tried setting 3 toast was very dark burnt almost. I tried setting 1 and that came out perfect. So my setting will remain on 1. Otherwise i would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, too slow though.
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough toaster, but it takes a while to finish a toasting cycle, too much time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Galligan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOASTER
customer_reviews.text: This KitchenAid toaster is great! Seriously!!! Fantastic, well packaged, works perfectly and the RED JUST POPS. ..oh and did i forget, the price is not bad. Perfect size even for a small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Luka A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: In addition to be a great looking toaster, it works as needed. It beeps right before the toasts pops, which I like. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I have always been happy with the KitchenAid brand and this toaster did not fail to live up to my expectations. Color on-line is accurate. Very deep bright red. A beautiful addition to your kitchen. Easy to function.
customer_reviews.author: JLRM

customer_reviews.title: The toaster color was a perfect match and so far has operated perfectly so that ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item because we changed the color scheme of our kitchen. The toaster color was a perfect match and so far has operated perfectly so that is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: tonyboe

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and operating toaster
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and operating toaster. Bagel function works very well. Can also do English Muffins on 1 cycle, but could use one additional lower setting as some breads toast dark even on the #1 setting.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre G

customer_reviews.title: Gone cheap and junky - Uneven, Sensitive, Burnt fingers, Slow
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same one 10 years ago. It was great. They have gone cheap and junky. 1) knob is to sensitive. raw to burnt in small turn of knob 2) burn your finger getting the toast out due the lift not high enough. 3) foot print got larger than the old one. why? . Spend a few $ more and get something else. Life's is too short.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sandifer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Good little toaster. I used a KitchenAid toaster at a rental and it was so fast. This one isn't as fast but I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Feldt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The KitchenAid Toaster is exactly what I wanted. Not complicated, easy to clean, toasts evenly and matches all my KitchenAid appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great! even beeps when the toast / bagel is ...
customer_reviews.text: works great ! even beeps when the toast / bagel is done !
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Love this color
customer_reviews.text: Love this color. Works great and it even makes a beeping noise when it's done that I can hear in the other room.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Decent product.Settings are accurate.A touch slow on the toasting but acceptable
customer_reviews.author: Special “K”

customer_reviews.title: If you are in a hurry, skip the toast!
customer_reviews.text: This is a suuuuuuuuuuuper-slow toaster that produces uneven toasting results.
customer_reviews.author: Nom De Plume

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: great toaster....pretty fast, even cooking area, looks good....nice job, kitchen aid...!
customer_reviews.author: mwgreen

customer_reviews.title: This KitchenAid toaster is not reliable. Toasting results are ...
customer_reviews.text: This KitchenAid toaster is not reliable. Toasting results are inconsistent; one time its too light and the next is too dark despite using the same toast setting. After one year the knob to engage the toaster broke rendering it very difficult if not impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 6 months and then stopped working entirely. It sat on the counter in the same spot and was used about 3 times per week, so not heavy usage. Not sure if I can return it for a refund after this much time.?
customer_reviews.author: J.Miller

customer_reviews.title: Dead toaster
customer_reviews.text: After 18 months the toaster stopped functioning. It also never toasted both sides of bread.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 5 months later
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toaster in February of 2017. It stopped working in July. Was not dropped or damaged. I thought I would be safe with KitchenAid. Spent more money to supposedly get a reliable toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Living Faith Christian Church

customer_reviews.title: looks great on our counter
customer_reviews.text: replaced a toaster from about 20 years ago, lokks and works great
customer_reviews.author: jim dolde

customer_reviews.title: Needs a higher lift,
customer_reviews.text: Needs a higher lift, I eat a lot of english muffins and there is a tendency to burn fingers trying to get them out
customer_reviews.author: Paul Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: Toaster is beautiful and browns toast for the most part pretty evenly. Downside is it beeps when it’s done with the toast. We have a dog that freaks out when it does. No way to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Clark

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking....
customer_reviews.text: Uneven toasting, not enough control, toast at 2 is too light 3 is too dark(no in between), bagel at 4 is too light sometimes. Have to stand over it (for a long time) to keep an eye on it. Will keep it for a while but then shop for another.
customer_reviews.author: Ted D.

customer_reviews.title: Toasts unevenly
customer_reviews.text: Toasts one side and not the other. Worst toaster I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Mann

customer_reviews.title: Burnt Toast on One Side, Uneven Toasting.
customer_reviews.text: Burns toast on one side, leaving the other side relatively untoasted. Inspection during toasting reveals that the heating elements do not evenly heat (glow red). While attempting to adjust the darkness dial (Levels 1-5), any setting over 2 would burn the toast leaving the upper ranges (3-5) relatively useless. I manipulated both the darkness setting and ensured the BAGEL setting was OFF, however the toaster continued to malfunction and burn toast. Unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Geng

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new toaster easily to clean pretty toasts great very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: c.s.burton

customer_reviews.title: Toasted
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and toasts bread well. I use it for my hamburger buns to get that just crisp but not burned texture.
customer_reviews.author: HughL

customer_reviews.title: Poor toasting
customer_reviews.text: Some of the coils do not heat so the bread toasts in some parts and not others.
customer_reviews.author: Peggie E Kegel

product_meta.title: KitchenAid KMT2115ER Toaster with Manual High-Lift Lever, Empire Red
product_meta.description: Color:Empire RedAn attractive and functional addition to any countertop, the KitchenAid 2-Slice Toaster offers a variety of functions for everyday use. Toast bread to your desired shade, precisely toast the cut sides of bagels, defrost and toast frozen food or reheat previously toasted food in under a minute. Plus, a high lift lever makes it easy to remove whatever you're toasting.
